name: Gnome Kick
description:
Your allergies are acting up, but as a Gardening Gnome, you must try and keep the bugs out of the plants.

Kick the bugs (spacebar) to boot them off the garden, but beware of the pollen!

(Made for Weekly Game Jam 233, Theme: Gardening)

PS No gnomes were hurt in the making of this game.

PPS I'm sorry if you came here expecting to kick gnomes but got this game instead.

Credits

Music from zapsplat. Terrible pixel art by me.
